summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2918, for the improvement of the north side of West Dravus Street form 3rd Avenue West to 4th Avenue West, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks with the necessary wooden cross walks; under Ordinance No. 35255 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
